item.title: Report X-2024070685
item.description:
Report X-2024070685

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-12T15:12:45+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-01
  • City: DENVER
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The contents of this shipment began to spill after the lids popped open becoming slightly ajar. This likely could have been avoided through the inclusion of more inner packing and the inclusion of a LQ diamond on the outer packing as the package probably would have been handled as a LQ shipment.
